activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.RecycleBinConversationsActivity

static_properties.text: No stored conversations have been found

activities.summary: This activity, RecycleBinConversationsActivity, displays conversations stored in the recycle bin and allows users to manage them. It provides functionality to load and display conversations, set up toolbar interactions, and supports an option to empty the recycle bin when applicable.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.NewConversationActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Launches ThreadActivity with the selected suggested contact to start a new conversation.
Shows the image/avatar of the suggested contact.
Displays the name of the suggested contact.

activities.summary: The NewConversationActivity allows users to create a new conversation by selecting a contact or entering a phone number. It provides features such as searching and filtering contacts, displaying suggested contacts, handling third-party intents, and launching the messaging thread activity upon user selection.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Provides a layer to manage complex UI interactions, including handling floating action buttons and coordinating animations.
Allows users to search through conversations. If open, pressing back closes it instead of navigating backward.
Holds scrollable views and coordinates scrolling behaviors with app bar elements.
Used to manage nested layouts within the main coordinator layout.
Contains core UI elements like progress bars, lists, placeholders, and other conversation-related views.
Displays an indeterminate progress bar while conversations are being loaded.

static_properties.text: No stored conversations have been found

dynamic_properties.action: Display message when no conversations exist
dynamic_properties.effect: Shows a placeholder message indicating no conversations have been found.
Displays additional guidance if no conversations exist, e.g., 'Start a conversation'.
Enables fast scrolling through the list of conversations.
Lists all available SMS conversations and manages their visual presentation with animations.
Holds the UI elements related to search functionality, initially hidden until search is active.
Displays a message when no matching conversations are found during a search.
Guides the user by instructing them to type at least two characters for search.
Displays filtered conversation results based on the user's search input.
Triggers creation of a new conversation or navigates to the messaging screen.

static_properties.text: No stored conversations have been found

activities.summary: The MainActivity serves as the main interface for managing SMS conversations in the app. It supports functionalities such as searching, displaying conversations, handling app password protection, and dynamically refreshing UI components based on settings and user interactions.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.ThreadActivity

static_properties.text: Can\'t reply to short codes like this
Can\'t reply to short codes like this

dynamic_properties.effect: removes the selected contact from the participant list

activities.summary: The ThreadActivity is the core messaging interface for managing SMS/MMS conversations. It supports sending and scheduling messages, attaching media or files, managing participants, blocking numbers, archiving/unarchiving threads, handling scheduled messages, and interacting with message content (such as editing, deleting, or restoring messages). The activity also includes UI components for displaying messages, selecting contacts, and responding to special number types like short codes.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.SimpleActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as a simple interface for user interaction, potentially handling navigation to other parts of the application such as configuration settings and the main login functionality.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.ConversationDetailsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Holds all UI elements and provides coordination for child views such as toolbars and floating action buttons.
Shows the title 'Conversation details' and acts as the top app bar for the activity.
Groups UI components related to conversation details, such as the conversation name and member list.
Labels the section indicating that the following element is the conversation name.
Opens a dialog to rename the conversation. Displays an edit icon to indicate editability.
Provides a horizontal divider between the conversation name and members sections.
Labels the section indicating that the following list contains conversation participants.
Shows a list of participants in the conversation. Each participant item is clickable and opens the contact details screen if a contact exists.

activities.summary: This activity displays the details of a conversation, allowing users to view and rename the conversation name as well as view and interact with conversation participants.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.ArchivedConversationsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Serves as the main layout container for coordinating child views including the toolbar and scrollable content.
Shows the title 'Archive' and manages the overflow menu which includes an option to empty the archive.
Provides nested scrolling support with a behavior linked to the app bar for smooth material design scrolling.
Wraps additional UI components like the archive holder for better layout management.
Holds child views related to displaying archived conversations.
Displays an indeterminate progress bar during conversation loading with inward/outward animations and delay timing.

static_properties.text: No archived conversations have been found

dynamic_properties.effect: Shows a message when there are no archived conversations available.
Provides a fast scroller for navigating through the list of archived conversations quickly.
Displays the list of archived conversations with custom layout animation and scroll behavior.

activities.summary: This activity is used to display and manage archived conversations. It provides functionalities such as loading archived conversations, clearing all archives, updating the UI based on data state, and managing menu interactions.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.VCardViewerActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: hosts the toolbar and RecyclerView to manage layout hierarchy and coordinate behaviors for child views.
displays the toolbar with title 'Contact Details' and handles menu interactions such as adding a contact.
displays parsed vCard data in a scrollable list where each item represents a contact property, allowing user interaction via click events.

activities.summary: This activity is used to display contact details from a vCard file. It allows the user to interact with properties like phone numbers and email addresses, initiating calls or emails. The activity also provides an option to add the contact to the system.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.ManageBlockedKeywordsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Serves as the root layout for managing blocked keywords UI, supporting interactions with Material Design components like Toolbars and RecyclerView.
Displays the title 'Manage blocked keywords' and hosts the options menu (e.g., Add Blocked Keyword).
Wraps child views such as the RecyclerView and placeholder text views to structure the UI using ConstraintLayout.
Shows the dynamic list of blocked keywords using a custom RecyclerView adapter. Clicking on an item opens the dialog to edit the selected keyword.

static_properties.text: You are not blocking any keywords. You may add keywords here to block all messages containing them.

dynamic_properties.effect: Displays an informational message when no blocked keywords are present, indicating that the list is empty.
Encourages the user to add a blocked keyword by displaying a prompt if the list is empty.

static_properties.text: You are not blocking any keywords. You may add keywords here to block all messages containing them.

activities.summary: This activity, ManageBlockedKeywordsActivity, allows users to manage a list of blocked keywords in the SMS Messenger app. Users can add or edit blocked keywords through dialogs, and the list dynamically updates with RecyclerView. The UI includes placeholders for an empty state and provides options to trigger actions like adding new blocked keywords.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.SettingsActivity

static_properties.text: Show a character counter at writing messages
Remove accents and diacritics at sending messages
Show a character counter at writing messages
Remove accents and diacritics at sending messages

activities.summary: The SettingsActivity provides a user interface for configuring application settings, including message preferences, notification settings, blocked numbers and keywords, password protection, customization options (colors, font size), language, and message import/export functionality.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.smsmessenger.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The SplashActivity is typically used as the initial screen of the app, which might perform application initialization tasks and redirect to the main functionality of the app after a delay.
